0001001001111111 1011100011001001 0 -> sum: 1100101101001000, cout: 0
1110110011100110 1110011110001000 0 -> sum: 1101010001101110, cout: 1
1011110001001111 0010101000101100 0 -> sum: 1110011001111011, cout: 0
0011000010010111 0001111101001000 0 -> sum: 0100111111011111, cout: 0
1100010110111011 1010000011100101 0 -> sum: 0110011010100000, cout: 1

1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
1111111111111110 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111110, cout: 1

1111111111111111 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
